body.release:
<action dev="k" type="update" date="2010-08-25""> Wasteland Suite is now compiled with Java 6.
Implemented demolition flag in item lists.
Item type is now handled as a enum internally instead of an integer but XML file still uses an integer.

release.action: Added full support for the external data files used by Displacer's hacked EXE.
Patch for safe check (20) on map 4 was not working correctly.

Added full read and write support for the game files. unpackgame and packgame can be used to edit the maps in every respect (but within the limits of wasteland) with a simple text editor. A good XML editor is recommended to take advantage of the documented XML schema file.

Added an extractmaps program which can be used to extract the maps of wasteland as PNG files. It reads the tilemaps from the game files, the tiles from the allhtds files and the sprites from the ic0_9.wlf file and then merges them into graphical maps and saves them into PNG files.

Replaced unpackwlf and packwlf with unpackmasks, packmasks, unpacksprites and packsprites because I found out that the two WLF files of wasteland have different formats and ic0_9.wlf does contain sprite images and not animation bit masks.
Fixed fixwloffsets problems with different EXE files unpacked with different EXE unpackers.
Added read and write support for CPA files
Added read and write support for HTDS (tilesets) files
Added read and write support for PICS files (encounter animations) files
Added read and write support for curs file
Added read and write support for colorf.fnt file
Added fixwloffsets program to fix the MSQ offsets in wl.exe
